text: ‘Visible cringe’: Serviceman scowls amid Trump rant on 'people who don't speak languages'  —  A serviceman standing behind Donald Trump at a border town press conference Thursday was seen scowling as the former president ranted against “people who don't speak languages.”

Mitch McConnell: Some Thoughts on Mastery, Destruction and Minority Rule  —  Mitch McConnell is one of those perhaps historic figures for whom the greatness of his skill and impact are matched only in inverse by the malignity of his impact on our politics.  To put it more brashly, McConnell was great at doing political evil.
